text: When Ambrose Dared Walrus is a 1915 silent short film directed by Walter Wright. The film was produced by the Keystone Film Company under the working title Fire Insurance Story. It was distributed by Mutual Film. It was released in the United States on July 12, 1915. == References == == Other websites== * Category:1915 movies Category:Silent movies Category:Short movies
title: When Ambrose Dared Walrus
